meanings.sent1: She accidentally retears the paper while trying to fix it.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to retear the delicate fabric when sewing it back together.
meanings.sent3: He managed to retear the same piece of paper three times in a row!
meanings.sent4: The old wound seemed to retear with every step he took.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fabric retearing echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: After the repair, she accidentally retears the book's cover.
meanings.sent2: Please don't retear the wrapping paper when opening the gift.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to retear the same envelope when sealing it.
meanings.sent4: The storm's strong winds threaten to retear the roof off the house.
meanings.sent5: The child's attempt to retear the paper only resulted in a mess.
